name: Gray Blocks
description:
Simple platform game created using Unreal Engine 4. Your goal is to stay alive as long as you can by navigating between randomly generated, moving blocks. You start with 30 seconds and lose when remaining time is 0, but you can collect balls (aka "cures"), that extend this time by another 30 seconds.

--- Controls ---
Moving: WSAD
Jump: Space
Quit: Esc

Have fun!
